name: Iron Palm
description: Deal 30 damage. If this kills the opponent, restore 20% of your maximum HP.

immediateEffect.script: int prevHP = Opponent.CurrentHP; DealDamage(Opponent, 30); if (prevHP > 0 && Opponent.CurrentHP <= 0) { int heal = (int)(Player.MaxHP * 0.20); Player.CurrentHP += heal; Log(PlayerDisplayName + " absorbs " + heal + " HP from the finishing blow!"); }
